name: py-tomli
description:
Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
with TOML v1.0.0.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-pep517
dependent_to.description: Wrappers to build Python packages using PEP 517 hooks.

dependent_to.name: py-black
dependent_to.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you
agree to cede control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black
gives you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting.

dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-scm
dependent_to.description: The blessed package to manage your versions by scm tags.

dependent_to.name: py-flit
dependent_to.description: Flit is a simple way to put Python packages and modules on PyPI.

dependent_to.name: py-x21
dependent_to.description: Used for unpacking this author's obfuscated libraries

dependent_to.name: py-build
dependent_to.description: A simple, correct PEP517 package builder.
